head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZEICHNER, THEODORE W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZEICHNER, THEODORE W.

block.p: ZEICHNER-Theodore W. October 26, 2000. Longtime attorney with MFY Legal Services. Beloved husband of Gwen. Devoted father of Steve and Rachel. Loving grandfather of Sarah and Elizabeth. Dear brother of Leo Zeichner and Dorothy Geller. Service Sunday 11:30 AM, Plaza Memorial, 91st Street and Amsterdam Avenue. Memorial service on Wednesday, November 1, 3:00 PM, New York County Lawyers' Assoc., 14 Vesey Street, New York City.
